alert.note: Alert for Huron; Sanilac; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tuscola, northwestern Sanilac and Huron Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caseville to near Sebewaing to near Quanicassee. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pigeon around 305 PM EDT. Port Austin and Kinde around 310 PM EDT. Elkton around 315 PM EDT. Bad Axe, Gagetown and Owendale around 325 PM EDT. Cass City and Port Hope around 330 PM EDT. Ubly around 345 PM EDT. Harbor Beach around 350 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Redman, Parisville, Colling, Huron City, White Rock, Wisner, Ivanhoe, Rapson, Grindstone City and Bay Port. People attending Huron Community Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
